Question.Subject: how long does it takes for cookies to expire?
Question.Content: if i logged on to yahoo answer from someone else computer and forget to log off , how long would it take to autimatically log off is there anything i can do now
Question.ChosenAnswer:
well, if you have ticked in setting that cookie is valid for 2 weeks, then it will expire after that. You can put it for 1 day, and then it expires.
my advise, clear your privacy every time you use someone's PC.
easiest is to use keyboard shortcuts.
in IE8, and Firefox use CTRL + SHIFT + DELETE and select all and you're done. in Opera, goto Tools/Delete Privacy data, tick all things you want to delete and press OK.
Grivier
